item.title: CVE-2024-29093|2024-03-19T16:40:14.011Z -- Tobias Conrad -- Builder for WooCommerce reviews shortcodes – ReviewShort
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Tobias Conrad Builder for WooCommerce reviews shortcodes – ReviewShort.This issue affects Builder for WooCommerce reviews shortcodes – ReviewShort: from n/a through 1.01.3.
